The program meets daily from 9 am - 3:30 pm in DBH 2011, unless otherwise specified. Lunch will be from noon to 1:30pm.

Make sure to join our **Slack workspace**, you should have received an email. You may want to download the Slack app because we will be using this for communication throughout the program. Make sure notifications are on.
